en: And [He revealed] that the masjids are for Allah,
And [He revealed] that the masjids are for Allah,
so do not invoke with Allah anyone.

ar: وَأَنَّهُ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبْدُ اللَّهِ يَدْعُوهُ
en: And that when the Servant [i.e., Prophet] of Allah stood up supplicating Him,

ar: وَأَنَّهُ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبْدُ اللَّهِ يَدْعُوهُ
en: And that when the Servant [i.e., Prophet] of Allah stood up supplicating Him,
they almost became about him a compacted mass."
